Translations.Text: Vi remind popol. Kun your Lord's ben vi vi est nek soothsayer nor crazy
Ili dir Li est poet; just wait gxis li est dead
Dir Ir sur waiting mi wait vi
Gxi est their songx ke dikt their behavior est ili naturally wicked
Do ili dir Li far gxi all Instead ili est simply disbelievers
Let them produkt Hadith this se ili est truthful
Ili kre nothing? Est ili creators
Ili kre heavens ter? Ja ili ne hav certainty
Ili posed trezor your Lord Ili en est control
Ili grimp ladder Do enables them auxskult Let their listeners montr their proof
Li Does daughters while vi hav hav fil
Vi pet them any wage kaj ili sxargx thereby
Ili kon future Do gxi recorded
Ili plotting kaj scheming disbelievers' schemes backfire them
Ili hav another di DI? DI GLOR far HAV partners
When ili seg mas fal cxiel ili dir Piled nub
Disregard them ili meet tag en which ili strik
Ke tag their schemes ne protekt them nor vol ili help
Those transgress sufer retribution here plej de them ne kon
Vi steadfastly persevere port your Lord's ordon! - Vi est our okul - Glor lauxd your Lord when vi get
Ankaux dum nokt glor Him je dawn as stel fade for
